### Types

TypeScript definitions for Divi Visual Builder packages.

Divi Visual Builder has been built with TypeScript and React. This package contains common types and interfaces that are used across multiple Divi Visual Builder packages. You can use these types to help as you build your own custom Divi Visual Builder extensions.

#### Usage

`@divi/types` package cannot be accessed on the following global window variable. It is only used internally by Divi Visual Builder packages during development.

#### References
Go to [Table of Contents](./package) to see all exported components and utilities of `@divi/types` package.

#### Types
If you are using Typescript, `@divi/types` is available on NPM at [`divi-types`](https://www.npmjs.com/package/divi-types)
